turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: It doesn't bother me.  I'm just not interested.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: Oh.  Like I'm not an interesting person.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: But you gave me a rose ...

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: And tomorrow I'll give one to somebody else.  Get dressed.  Get out.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: You shit.  Who do you think you are?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: I'm JP Monroe, you stupid little bitch. Now get the fuck out of my life.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: You ... I can't fucking believe you, you bastard!  You get me in here ...

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Right.  Like you were hog-tied or something.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: What ... What ... ?

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: What did you see?  The same as I. Appetite sated.  Desire indulged.  You saw the working of the world in miniature.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: That had nothing to do with the world. Not this one, anyway.

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: On the contrary.  It has everything to do with the world.  And our dreams of how it will succumb to us.  You enjoyed the girl?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: Good.  So did I.  And that's all ...

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: No!  No.  It's not the same ... I ... No.  What you did ... it was ... evil.

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: I understand.  Their fortune was so tempting, their affection so conditional.  What else could you do?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Fuck you!

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: Don't flee from yourself.  If you have a quality, let it define you.  Cultivate it.  It is you.  By helping me, you will help yourse...

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: What!?  What are you talking about?  Why should I help you?

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: Because you want to.  You've always wanted to.  Look at your pictures.  Look at your sculptures.  Look at those tawdry representations and then ... Imagine.  Imagine a world of the body as canvas.  The body as clay.  Your will and mine as the brush and the knife. Oh, I have such sights to show you.

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: A dark star rising.  I was bound to another's system by a soul I once possessed.  A friend relieved me of that inconvenience.  Now I'm free.  Born again of Blood and Desire.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Hey, that's what makes the world go round.

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: You see, we're not so dissimilar.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: But how in God's name ...

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: God?  My God was diamond and black light.  And I was his Dark Pope.  All that is changed.  A terrible beauty is born.  With a place at my right hand for a man of your tastes.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: How do we start?

turns.speaker: PINHEAD
turns.text: It has already begun.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Joey?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Not quite.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: JP?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Live and in the flesh.  How're you doing, babe?

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: What do you want?

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Yeah right.  How'd you get this number?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Will you relax?  Your little girlfriend left a card, remember?

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Oh.  Yeah.  Yeah.  Well ... I'm fine. Things are great here.  Joey's going to get me a job at the TV station.  I'm meeting lotsa new people.  It's really great.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Really?

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Yeah really.  I'm ...

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: No.  I mean, really?  Because I'm concerned for you, sweetheart.  I care about you.  I guess I miss you.  I'm sorry we split up.  I'm sorry I ...

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: You're apologizing?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Hey, it has been known.  C'mon Terri, I'm not that bad a guy.  I have regrets. I'd like to put things right.  Don't tell me you haven't thought about me. Huh?

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Well ... of course I have.  I've thought.  I've ... Oh, JP, you were so horrible.  You really hurt me ...

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: I know.  I know.  It's bad.  I'm a bad person.  But I try not to be, Terri.  I really do.  And I really miss you.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: I miss you too.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: That's so good to hear, sweetheart.  It really is. You know, I .. are you alone?

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Yes. 53

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Good ... Good ... Look, why don't you come over?  You know, nothing heavy, little drink maybe, little talk.  Just see how we both feel?

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Oh, I don't ...

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: C'mon.  It'll be great.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Not quite.  This wasn't here.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: No.  But, as you can see, I'm having some work done on it.  You found a real treasure for me, Terri.  I hope I can show you how grateful I am.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Yeah ... yeah, it looks different.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Yeah, a girl I know helped smarten it up.  Put her heart and soul into it.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: A girl?  Anyone I should know?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Not now, no.  I mean - now that you're here, it's like she doesn't even exist, you know what I mean?

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Yeah right.  Look ...

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Terri, listen.       Why don't you come here and kiss me?  I mean, it's probably ticking away in both our minds, right?  Is it going to happen?  Isn't it going to happen?  Let's get it out of the way.  See how we feel.  Then we can relax.  Talk.  You know.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: I don't think so.  Not yet.  I'm not ready yet.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Sure.  Sure.  I understand.  It's cool. I mean, we've got all night.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: That's terrible.  What a bitch.  She was obviously just using you, Terri.  Ready to dump you the second she had what she needed, interfering little whore.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: No.  It isn't ... she wouldn't ... It's like I must have done something wrong, you know?  Freaked her out.  Just fucked up something good again.

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Hey, you didn't fuck it up with me.  You know that.  It was my fault, babe, it really was.  And you know I'm sorry. And I'm sorry to see you upset now.  I hate to see you in pain like this.

turns.speaker: TERRI
turns.text: Really?

turns.speaker: JP
turns.text: Yes!  God, yes.  I ... I just want to hug you.  To hold you.  To tell you it's alright.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Oh thank God, you're dead...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: It was so beautiful!  When the blanks went off, they...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: You're saying you want us to beat them to the crystal and save the world from financial disarray.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Something like that.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Well, forget about it.  Hawk and I are going to Rio.  We're hurt, we're tired, and a hero ain't nothing but a sandwich.  Right, buddy?...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Hudson, God's given you a gift for cat burglary, you can t just...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: That was beautiful.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I laughed, I cried.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: The security's actually not that severe.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: It doesn't have to be.  Everybody knows that if you mess with the Kremlin, you'll end up in a Siberian gulag eating your own fingernails.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Delivery Entrance.  Low Security.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Gum.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Eighth room down, babe...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Guards come exactly every three minutes....

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: That's the first thing I did. Smooch the ground and taste the freedom.  Sorry I was late.  Miss anything?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Your timing, and your shoes, are impeccable...  Good to see you, Alex, been having a lousy day.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Lousy day?  The man's getting out of prison and he's having a lousy day.  What, you missing out on the Cell Block Water Ballet pageant?  Believe me, it's overrated.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Looks like you've been expanding your...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Don't say it, Hawkins.  I'm incredibly sensitive about my fucking figure.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: My next word was gonna be "consciousness."  Swear to God... tubby.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: That's your definition of "Hard?"

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Show off.  Hey, boss tune.  "Come Fly with Me."

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Three minutes, 51 seconds.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Still do the puzzles, still know the running times of songs, and I'll bet you're still the best damn cat burg--

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Not anymore.  Now I'm the laziest damn cat burg--I'm going to take it so straight that I won't tape a Mets game without the expressed written consent of the National Baseball League.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Now that you're born again,what do you wanna do?  Statue of Liberty?  Entertain some ladies? Miss Saigon tix?  Seduce some women?  Play Nintendo?  Bone some chicks?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Come on, Alex, let's just get to Alex's.  Your bar's the only place that's going to cheer me. God, I'd kill for a damn cappuccino.  What the hell's a Nintendo?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Oh man, you still got a thing for those unmasculine European coffees? Who's your buddy?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: So Mr. Coffee, what went down outside the prison?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Oh, not much.  Mario Brothers want me to do a job.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Those dago-guinea-I can say this shit I'm Italian-wop motherfu--

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Ah, had the perfect amount of foam.  Just get me to the bar... It's the one good thing in my life that'll never change....

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I didn't know how to tell you.  A couple brokers stopped in for Stoley Spritzers one night.  Next thing I know Fast Track Digest votes us "Watering Hole of the Month."  Now, I'm shopping for Aqua Salmon wallpaper.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: I read about these people in Newsweek.  Where's all the regulars, Crazy Jeff Cava, the Todd sisters, Indian Joe?  Where's Ed Kranepool's autograph?  Captain Bob's steering wheel?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Hey, get this irritable guy a cappuccino.  I gotta go be a boss.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Alex, did you know this ape was going to be here...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Sure.  That's why his meatballs are made out of marinated Chuck Wagon.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Hmmmm.....

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Yo Pandora, quit hummm-ing... look at this.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: It's Captain Bob's steering wheel! Remember when the Captain.....

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Hmmm, nasty little safe on the 7th.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: The safe's a Simpson 71.  Last time I played the game, Simpson only had a 40.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Just means it'll take you an extra 31 seconds to seduce.  You re still the best, I know it.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: But you got three guards who... Shit, what am I doing?  Where's the want ads?  Gonna sell some spatulas.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Hey, I'm sorry, man.  I'm putting out a fire with kerosene.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: This isn't funny.  I'm not into this.  I...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: There goes five seconds...My record's eighteen.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: You're not...LISTENING!

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: I'm sorr--Goddamn Mario Brothers. Goddamn Gates.  Goddamn Rutherford Auction House.  By the way, how many seconds?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Rutherford Auction... that name...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Alex!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Don't wet your diapers.  I'll have to change them.  "Witchcraft." What's the running time?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Whoa, you better cut a bigger hole than that.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Hey, you promised......Don't worry, I'm wearing my girdle.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Cameras?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: No need.  Guards' station's right there.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: They record everything their video surveillance takes in...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Yes, master-thief, I can see that. You said something about a plan...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: You got about five minutes and change.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: 5:32.  "Swinging on a Star."

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: You know they invented something while you were inside.  Called a watch.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: "A mule is an animal with long funny ears."

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: "He kicks up at anything he hears.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: "He can't write his name or read a book.  To fool people is his only thought."

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: "And though he's slippery, he still gets caught."

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: "And all the monkeys aren't in the zoo."

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: "Every day you meet quite a few."

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: The song's over!  Come on! "You could be swinging on a star."

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: What am I doing here?  There are so many things I wanna do that aren't this.  Paint a lighthouse. Kiss a woman in Italy.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: "You could be swinging on a star."

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Paint a woman in a lighthou--I don't want to steal a horse. Life is...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Did I miss anything?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Oh, not much.  Gates just had his tonsils taken out.  The hard way.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Geez, Gates was killed.  Who do we send the thank you note to?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: The Butler did it.  Guy was a cross between Alistair Cook and a Cuisinart. Dude took Mr. Ed and humptied dumptied it over Gates's head.  He said it was made by, get this, Leonardo..

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Ah yes, a rare Renaissance piece. Da Vinci's "Sforza," an equestrian model of a never executed statue. I consider it to be the prize of tonight's auction of objets d'equestrian.  Horse things.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Okay, you got me, Mr. PBS.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Morning edition.  Seems two thieves "attempted" to steal it last night, but thanks to three "courageous" guards, it will be ready for tonight.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: "Attempted."  At-tempt-ted!  I'm not happy about having to steal that horse, but I do have my pride.  Face it, when it comes to burglary, and sex, I....

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Boing.  Uh, this I don t understand...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Why try?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Because I'm tired of not understanding things.  Cops, Mafia, and butlers forcing me to bust my ass to steal something, which it turns out I really didn't steal--it's fucked up.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: You re not thinking of going to...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Alex, my man, it's time to play a little offense.  Where's your tux?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: You bastard.  You fucked my freedom for a lousy job.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: But I said I was sorry....

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: No sweat, Alex, you only made the biggest mistake of <u>my</u> life.  What was your per-diem?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Don't act like you've never committed a crime before, Hawkins?  I know, I made call, when Anna tracked me down I...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Rio, Alex?  After all they've done to...Hey, these tickets are for Moscow!

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Damn travel agency.  That Kremlin thing is in Moscow, isn't it?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: We're going in from the ground floor.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Geez, this Art Treasures Room looks like a burnt diaphragm.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Shwoof, that makes me feel better. I can't believe this is the Iron Curtain.  All the guy at Airport customs wanted to know was "Who Shot J.R.?"

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: You sound disappointed.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Yeah, I mean, come on, going through the Iron Curtain is supposed to be crawling underneath barbed wire, it's supposed to be strangling a guard...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Count of three?

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Why not just go now?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: "Oh, we ain't got a barrel of money.

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: "Maybe we're ragged and funny."

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Now that's a lock.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Don't worry, we'll get it...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: "Oh this lock is a pain in the bu-utt"

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: "How'd we ever get such in a ru-utt"

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: That was close....

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Anna, I think you better stay....

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: You can be lookout!.....  Take Alex's gun.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: "We all had our quarrels and parted..."

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: "But we'll be the same as we started...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I'm a ghost.  Boo.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: I don't want to sound immature, but we were here first...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Alex, are you....

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: I can't believe you didn't notice. My weight.  I lost ten pounds in Rome

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: You're a reed, man.  I gotta get Anna.  Hang in there...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Get 'em.  They went down the hallway.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Let's just forget it, I mean...

turns.speaker: ALEX
turns.text: Get em....

turns.speaker: ALFRED
turns.text: Ta ta, Hudson Hawk.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Too-do-loo, babe.

turns.speaker: ALFRED
turns.text: Welcome to Rome, sir.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Yes way.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: My life is not some deal.  I...

turns.speaker: ALFRED
turns.text: It's Boston, Mr. Mayflower.

turns.speaker: ALFRED
turns.text: Welcome back to Vinci.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Last rites, sister?

turns.speaker: ALFRED
turns.text: How.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: You're unemployed, Alfie.  Boss is dead.  Her plan is over.

turns.speaker: ALFRED
turns.text: My plan is just beginning.  I'll forgive you for denying me the pleasure of slaughtering my boorish employers, but I'm afraid the birth of the new British Empire can have no witnesses!

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Ooh-kay...

turns.speaker: KAPLAN
turns.text: Don't you just hate kids...

turns.speaker: ALMOND JOY
turns.text: George, you promised.  No Old CIA/ New CIA jokes...

turns.speaker: KAPLAN
turns.text: I call them the MTV.I.A.  Punks think Bay of Pigs is an herbal tea. They think the Cold War involves penguins and...

turns.speaker: ALMOND JOY
turns.text: Grapple, Biker's bottle, hairspray, black turtleneck, Pocket Fisherman, acid, collapsible yardstick, softball, and 72 stamps. Gee Stud, this is going to be some date.  No Harvey's Bristol Cream?

turns.speaker: KAPLAN
turns.text: Snickers, make the list happen. Oh and it's one thing to play hide and seek with the Mayflower's pathetic staff, but we're sore losers.  I've put jumper cables on the nipples of children and not always in the line of duty.

turns.speaker: ALMOND JOY
turns.text: With all due respect to that great blouse, why didn't I cut out her heart?

turns.speaker: KAPLAN
turns.text: Close call, but she's our only way of keeping tabs on that damn mysterious Vatican organization. Hawk, it's time to go to the principal's office....

turns.speaker: ALMOND JOY
turns.text: Lucky for us, the Da Vinci is located in a wing of the Kremlin that they used to throw the Miss Ukraine pageant and stuff.  It'll have the least number of guards....

turns.speaker: KAPLAN
turns.text: As for our plan of action, anybody'd be insane to go in from the ground floor...

turns.speaker: SNICKERS
turns.text: Come on, Pierre, Steak-bur-ger, Fren-n-ch Fries.  This is France, you gotta have French.....

turns.speaker: ALMOND JOY
turns.text: Actually we're in Italy, Snickers, she said as if it made a difference.

turns.speaker: SNICKERS
turns.text: Italy, France, Moscow.  They all just wanna be Nebraska.  Old Man Kaplan thinks since Communism is dead, we got nothing to do.  Man, Democracy isn't free elections. We gotta teach the world that Democracy is Big Tits, College Football on Saturdays, Eddie Murphy saying the word "Fuck" and Kids putting their hands down garbage disposals on "America's Funniest Home Videos."

turns.speaker: ALMOND JOY
turns.text: Damn baby, when's the last time you had a vacation...Jesus, I gotta get out of this job.  If my Mom knew her daughter assassinated the leader of the anti-Apartheid movement....

turns.speaker: SNICKERS
turns.text: Quit bitching, you got the employee of the month plaque for that shit...Ah to be in Pari-is and in love.

turns.speaker: SNICKERS
turns.text: This is the room above the Art Treasures room.  The lock is a Natalya Z-Z, first created...

turns.speaker: ALMOND JOY
turns.text: Snickers, baby, I love you like a brother, but really, who cares? Silencer bomb...

turns.speaker: ALMOND JOY
turns.text: What the hell....

turns.speaker: SNICKERS
turns.text: You're supposed to be dead!

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: Did he mention the Mayflowers?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: No, your Eminence.  I think he's going to steal the Codex, as early as next week.

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: Attempt, you mean.  The vanity of this man, Hudson Hawk.  The Vatican has foiled the advances of Pirates and Terrorists.  We will not lie down for some schmuck from New Jersey.  Must you flirt with him so realistically?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: That's the best kind.  A wise woman once said "Polite conversation is rarely either."

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: Let me be the one to quote Scripture.  ....As an agent of our organization, you are put in awkward situations.  Just remember, Hudson Hawk is an evil, evil man.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Yeah.  The big E.

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: Hit me with your best shot.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I betrayed a man.  A good man.  An innocent man.  A thief.

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: Anna, what are you trying to say...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: He came into a world where crime is a legitimate business tactic and a legitimate government procedure.  But he knew Right and Wrong.  Oh, and we kind of messed around...

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: "Messed around" messed around?  I know-- I don't want to know.  First base?  Second Base?  Stop me when I'm getting warm...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: A little petting is not the issue!

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: Sorry.  Seventeen Hail Marys and five minutes outside.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: You got it.  Operation Deflower Mayflower is a bad joke and I'm the punchline.  I thought we were using the CIA to help us to get Mayflower, but really the CIA was using me to keep us away from Mayflower.

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: Oh, why couldn't I be the Cardinal in charge of catering.... If the Mayflowers get the three sections of Da Vinci's crystal and his instructions for the gold machine-- Aie-yi--Do we got anything?  What of Alex, Hawk's friend, where is his loyalty?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I'm going to find out.

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: I'm sorry for losing it back there, but you must remember, sister, you have vows to God as well as a mission to the world.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I know, I know, your Eminence, just say "God go with me."

turns.speaker: CARDINAL
turns.text: God go with you, sister.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Oh, the shit is going to hit the fa--

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Fantastic.  Perfection.  The Vatican extends its jealousy to the lucky bidder.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: My God, that was bold of you, you didn't have to do that...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Forget about it--it was nothing-- anybody would have done the same thing--It's an impulse...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: No, I meant you didn't have to tackle me and rip my dress.  A polite push, perhaps?  A clear shout of "watch out, Anna" would have done nicely...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Excuse me, Milady.  I would have flown over and carried you up to a pink cloud, but I left my cape at the cleaners.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Thanks tough guy, thanks a lot. Why was the guard chasing you?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Because Danger, Doc, is my middle...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Tough guy.  What are you--How's your head.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Yes, and my giraffe loves it, too...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: As you know, the Da Vinci Codex, has lived in the Vatican for centuries and will continue to live here for centuries more.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: That's what you theenk.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Question, sir?   His untiring pen predicted the airplane, the submarine, the bicycle, the helicopter, and even the tank.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Come on, this stuff will knock you out.  Have you ever had the feeling you were being followed, Mr. Bond.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Never, why do you ask?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Whoa.  Name's Hawkins, Eddie Hawkins. My nickname's Hudson Hawk, but don't call me Hudson, not even as a joke. The Nuns at St. Agnes called me that and they're the ones who helped make me what I am today. Not a compliment...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Sure Hudson.  Are you going to tell me why you did that back there or are you going to blame it on Dumbo?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Could you believe that crazy elephant?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Whoa, part 2.  Does it go to Times Square?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Delivers up to ten at night.  The Pope has an obsession with his Easter Seals.  It's actually not that an unusual set-up.  The secret passageway on the other hand....

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: The Vatican is made of constant mysteries meant to be enjoyed, not explained.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Nice.  But right out of our brochure.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Oh, you read that.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Actually I wrote it.  It's a good sentence.  It can apply to people.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: You're not an unmysterious thang yourself.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I don't steal stuffed elephants from little girls.  And I buy my own clothes.  My life's a little boring...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: God, I wish I could say the same thing.  What about having a nice, dull dinner with me tonight. Scrabble, Knock-knock jokes, Anecdotes about famous dead Italians....

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I'll bring my entire repertoire...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: And I'll bring my entourage...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Secret passageways don't mean as much as they used to.  There's a place two blocks east of here. Enzo's.  Say 10:30.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Said.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Oh Hudson, I was worried you weren't going to drop by....

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: I never break a date.  Scout's honor.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: This is bueno.  They had the worst ketchup in prison.....uh...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Prison?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: I was the Warden?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: How long were you in?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Let's just say, I never saw E.T.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Wow, you were "in the joint." "Doing hard time."  It's funny, but that excites me.  I seem to have a thing for sinners.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: I seem to have a thing for sinning. sinning.  Check please....

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: What have you been doing?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Uh....old badminton injury.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: tickles, ticKleS, TICKLES.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Oh, I'm so sorry...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I'm sorry.  I can't.  I....

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Hey now, outside of a very friendly dog this morning, it's been a slow decade.  I don't make love every ten years, I get a little cranky.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: It's also been a long time for me.  I--

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Catholic girls are scary...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Somebody robbed the Vatican.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Oh.  No.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: It's not what you think.  Okay, maybe it is....

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: You really went and did it.  With one day, not even a day, of planning, you did it.  Nobody does it better, Hudson.  You started the week stealing the Sforza and you ended it swiping the Codex.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Wha--

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: What are your plans for the weekend?  Hoisting away the Colosseum?  Tell me, did the devil make you do it or did Darwin and Minerva Mayflower?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: For two years, I've been tracking the Mayflowers' peculiar interest in three Da Vinci pieces.  Their Sforza replica was as fake as the "gas leak" that supposedly destroyed it.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Does everyone in the world know more than me?  Jesus, I'm just some guy who happens to be good at swiping stuff.....Lifted a piece of licorice when I was one and a half.  Who knew it would lead... They even got the CIA involved!

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: The C.I. what?  God, no...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Ooh, I guess I do know something Here's looking at you, kid...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: This doesn't taste like cappuccino.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Oh, I must have put too much ethyl-chloride in it.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Hudson, don't you understand...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: And you, Dr. Cappucino, you're lucky I don't hit women, assuming you are a woman.  I'm not taking anything for granted anymore.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I-work-for-a-covert-Vatican-humanitarian- organization.  The-CIA-made-a-fool-of-me. I-care-for-you...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Oh.  Well, what's this?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Where did you get this?

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: You know, the place where you gave the bad guys the Codex.... the Mayflower Museum.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: It's from the machine.  All they need is the crystal to run it and they have 2/3 of it already.  We can't let that happen.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: You better believe I can.  I'm sick of people telling me what I have to do.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: It's that kind of selfish attitude that...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Selfish attitude?  I'm just some guy who wants a little nap and a cappuccino for when he wakes up, not too much foam...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: You re not "some guy" anymore, Hudson.  Right now, you're the only guy.  Without your help, I....

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Hey, don't take your disguise so seriously.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Uh, yeah.  Guess I'm a wee bit nervous.  I'm sorry I could only score clergy passports.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: Fits my new image.  A thief for the masses.  This is one job I'm not going to feel guilty about enjoying.  Gum.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Oh Hudson...

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: I told you not to call me Hudson. The only people who called me that were the nuns at...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Oh Hudson, I'm a sister of the Catholic church as well as an agent.

turns.speaker: HAWK
turns.text: This is too bad to be false.
